# Path of Glory, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch (see text)

**Area:** Four 5-ft. squares/level (see text)

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 189

This spell functions as *[[Path of Glory (Spell)|path of glory]]*, except as noted above, and a square provides 5 points of healing instead of 1.
